description: Technical Evidence Data Set (TEDS) Schema for RRP (Rollback Protocol) forensic capture.

attestation.signing_mandate: CRoT must cryptographically sign the entire TEDS artifact upon capture initiation (S02-S11 RRP trigger) to ensure non-repudiable forensic immutability.
attestation.signature_payload: Required cryptographic signature block (S12 equivalent trust anchor for TEDS)
